Html:
Hello everybody,
I have an HTML file with textfields, radio buttons, and dropdown bars.
At the bottom is a 'Submit' button.
I want to have it so that a user will fill in all of this information and then click 'Submit' and then for all of this information to be exported into an Excel file.
I really need some advice as to how I can possibly do this and also if it is even possible?
Thanks so much.
